title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
**Product Listing: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count**

**Description:**

Experience the renowned quality of Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, the preferred choice of teachers for over 100 years. Our exclusive #2 graphite formula ensures smooth performance and consistent lines, while the thick graphite core provides the perfect balance of strength and durability. Made from premium, responsibly sourced wood, these pencils are not only environmentally friendly but also crafted with exceptional attention to detail.

**Key Features:**

- **Exclusive #2 Graphite Formula:** Smooth performance and consistent lines
- **Thick Graphite Core:** Strength and durability for extended use
- **Premium Wood Quality:** Responsibly sourced and harvested from managed forests
- **Golden Yellow Lacquered Finish:** Matte coating for a classic look and feel
- **Pre-Sharpened:** Ready to use straight out of the box
- **Latex-Free Eraser:** Removes marks completely without smudging, featuring a signature green and gold ferrule
- **PMA Certified Non-Toxic:** Safe for use by students of all ages

**What Sets Us Apart:**

- **High-Quality Craftsmanship:** Over 100 years of tradition and expertise
- **Preferred by Teachers:** The go-to choice for educators seeking exceptional performance and reliability
- **Part of the Dixon Ticonderoga Family:** A legacy of quality and excellence in art supplies

**Product Specifications:**

- Count: 30 pencils
- Brand: Ticonderoga
- Brand Family: Prang, Dixon, Pacon, Tru-Ray, UCreate, Fadeless, Classroom Keepers, Bordette, Creativity Street, Spectra, Strathmore, Canson, Daler-Rowney, Lyra, Das, Maimeri, and Princeton Artist Brush

**Order now and experience the Ticonderoga difference for yourself!**
